trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for obtaining references to objects within a project by name or type, obtaining the name of a specified object, and for locating the parent of a specified object within a designer project.
trans-unit.target: 提供介面，在專案內依名稱或型別取得物件的參考、取得指定物件的名稱，以及在設計工具專案內找到指定物件的父物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService> interface provides the following methods:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>介面提供下列方法：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReference%2A> method returns the component with the specified name, or `null` if no component with the specified name was found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReference%2A>方法會傳回與指定的名稱、 元件或`null`如果找不到具有指定名稱的任何元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetName%2A> method returns the name associated with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetName%2A>方法會傳回與指定元件關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetComponent%2A> method returns the parent container of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetComponent%2A>方法會傳回指定元件的父容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReferences%2A> method returns an array of references to all project components, or all project components of an optionally specified type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReferences%2A>方法會傳回所有專案元件，參考的陣列，或所有專案的選擇性地指定類型的元件。

trans-unit.source: The following example control uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReferences%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService> interface to obtain a list of components in the current design mode project of the type of the currently selected component.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例控制項使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReferences%2A>方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>介面，以取得一份目前選取的元件類型的目前的設計模式專案中的元件。

trans-unit.source: The object to retrieve the parent component for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其擷取父元件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that contains the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含指定元件的元件。

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> that contains the specified object, or <see langword="null" /> if no parent component exists.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定物件的基底 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，或是，如果不存在父元件則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to return the name of.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定元件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object referenced, or <see langword="null" /> if the object reference is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 參考的物件名稱，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果物件參考無效)。

trans-unit.source: The name of each component sited in a design time project is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> where the component is sited.
trans-unit.target: 設定每個元件設置在設計階段專案名稱<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>元件決定位置的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the component to return a reference to.
trans-unit.target: 要參考傳回的目的元件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the component whose name matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得其名稱符合指定名稱的元件的參考。

trans-unit.source: An object the specified name refers to, or <see langword="null" /> if no reference is found.
trans-unit.target: 指定名稱參考的物件，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果沒有找到任何的參考)。

trans-unit.source: Gets all available references to project components.
trans-unit.target: 取得專案元件的所有可用參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets all available references to project components.
trans-unit.target: 取得專案元件的所有可用參考。

trans-unit.source: An array of all objects with references available to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有物件的陣列，具有可供 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService" /> 使用的參考。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return references to instances of.
trans-unit.target: 物件的型別，要傳回其執行個體的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets all available references to components of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定型別之元件的所有可用參考。

trans-unit.source: An array of all available objects of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定型別的所有可用物件的陣列。
